description: A piece of tissue harvested from a plant.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Reynoutria japonica, or Japanese knotweed if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from a plant.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Rudbeckia hirta, or black-eyed susan if you prefer English.

A piece of tissue harvested from a plant.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Sassafras albidum, or just sassafras if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from a plant.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Fagus grandifolia, or American beech if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from a plant.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Arabidopsis thaliana, or thale cress if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from a plant.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Selaginella moellendorffii.
